Text: Thank You, I was waiting for this.

So how is this game? Sounded pretty interesting. 
Is it good?
At last, download.....download....DOWNLOAD!!!!

Five seconds ago I played the first two parts in the tutorial and it's a very charming game, I think it becomes more interesting down the line but it was a very good start. Recommended and if you like the game, support the creators!

For some reason, at least for me, it CTDs as soon as the intro movie is done playing. Anyone know why? Admin, win7, more than enough space/memory/ram/graphics/cpu/whatever. Anyone able to confirm or deny?

Got some crash logs. Maybe someone could give their opinion on what I've done wrong, if anything.

make sure the desktop is not locked, and that no other application is running in full screen mode
avoid running under remote desktop or as window service
check the display properties to make sure hardware acceleration is set to full)
